name: Santaman vs The Jingle Gang
description:
The Jingle Gang lead by the mischievous Kunoichi Shade Noel have appeared to wreak havoc on the town. It's up to Holiday protector Santaman to drive these hooligans out and restore peace to the holidays.

Notes: Still in development and there may be a bug or two (if so never be afraid to let me know).

was working on an intro that will be in the next release as well as special moves and more goons ... Bosses too.
